member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME
member.summary: Contains the stack frame information. This structure is used with the function.

summary.para: x86: The program counter is EIP.
Intel Itanium: The program counter is a combination of the bundle address and a slot indicator of 0, 4, or 8 for the slot within the bundle.
x64: The program counter is RIP.
x86: The frame pointer is EBP.
Intel Itanium: There is no frame pointer, but AddrBStore is used.
x64: The frame pointer is RBP. AMD-64 does not always use this value.
x86: The stack pointer is ESP.
Intel Itanium: The stack pointer is SP.
x64: The stack pointer is RSP.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.BackingStoreOffset
member.summary: Intel Itanium: The backing store address.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.FuncTableEntry
member.summary: x86: An structure. If there is no function table entry, this member is NULL.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.Params
member.summary: The possible arguments to the function.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.Reserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for system use.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.Virtual
member.summary: If this is a virtual frame, this member is TRUE. Otherwise, this member is FALSE.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_STACK_FRAME.Reserved2
member.summary: This member is reserved for system use.
